name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Data Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance data solutions in the healthcare and finance sectors. Proficient in **Python**, **TypeScript**, and expert in data analytics using **Google Cloud Platform** and **BigQuery**. Skilled in utilizing **React** and **Vue** for building user interfaces, and adept in ETL processes to ensure efficient data processing. Deep understanding of **OAuth 2.0** and **OpenID Connect** for secure authentication and authorization in data handling.
Experienced in implementing security best practices to comply with industry standards. A strong foundation in full-stack development enhances my ability to integrate data-driven applications seamlessly, while my hands-on practice in designing and deploying scalable solutions fosters real-world impact. Passionate about leveraging data analytics and BI tools to drive informed decision-making in organizations.

experience.responsibilities:
• Utilized **Python** and **TypeScript** to design and implement data solutions on **Google Cloud Platform** for real-time data processing and analytics, optimizing ETL workflows for large datasets.
• Leveraged **BigQuery** for efficient data warehousing and querying, reducing query times by **30%** compared to previous solutions.
• Developed interactive dashboards using **BI tools** like Power BI, delivering actionable insights and advanced data visualizations for business users, enhancing decision-making processes.
• Implemented robust security measures following best practices, ensuring data integrity and compliance with standards such as OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect across data applications.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define data requirements and analytics strategies, contributing to enhanced data-driven decisions across multiple departments.
• Created and managed cloud-based data processing pipelines designed for scalability, reliability, and maintainability using modern frameworks.
• Analyzed and optimized data models, improving performance and storage efficiency by **40%**, leveraging tools for data analytics to extract meaningful patterns from complex datasets.
• Established continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) processes within data projects, utilizing version control strategies to streamline development and reduce errors.
• Engaged in regular code reviews to maintain high code quality and ensure alignment with organizational standards, applying secure coding practices.
• Conducted training sessions for team members on the usage of **React** and **Vue** for data visualization and interactive reporting, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing within the team.

Leveraged **Python** and **TypeScript** to enhance data processing capabilities and drive analytics initiatives in the financial sector.
Designed and implemented **ETL** processes using **Apache Airflow** and **Google Cloud Platform**, facilitating efficient data ingestion and transformation from various sources.
Utilized **BigQuery** for scalable data storage and analytics, enabling rapid query execution on large datasets and supporting data-driven decision-making.
Developed interactive dashboards and reporting tools using **React**, **Vue**, and BI tools, enhancing data visualization and accessibility for stakeholders.
Ensured compliance with security best practices including **OAuth 2.0** and **OpenID Connect**, safeguarding user data and transaction security across all applications.
Optimized data workflows to improve efficiency by **30%**, resulting in faster access to real-time insights for operational teams.
Engaged in regular performance tuning, achieving a **20%** reduction in processing time for ETL jobs through pipeline optimization and resource management.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement data analytics solutions that improved fraud detection accuracy by **25%**, safeguarding financial transactions.

Utilized **Python** and **TypeScript** to design and optimize data solutions, ensuring seamless integration with **Google Cloud Platform** for enhanced data processing capabilities.
Implemented robust ETL processes using **BigQuery**, leading to a 30% increase in data retrieval efficiency and enabling real-time analytics for business intelligence.
Developed interactive dashboards and reporting tools utilizing **React** and **Vue**, improving data visualization and accelerating decision-making processes by up to 40%.
Applied security best practices and protocols such as **OAuth 2.0** and **OpenID Connect** to safeguard data access, achieving compliance with GDPR throughout project deliverables.
Engineered data pipelines capable of processing over **1 million** records daily, speeding up data transformation tasks with a focus on scalability and performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish data governance policies, ensuring proper usage and ownership of data across all platforms.
Conducted thorough data analysis and provided insights using **BI tools**, driving strategic initiatives that resulted in a 20% increase in revenue year-over-year.
Executed regular audits of security frameworks, reducing vulnerabilities by **25%** through proactive monitoring and enhancements.
Utilized cutting-edge data modeling techniques that brought down data retrieval times by **15%**, directly benefiting the operational efficiency of analytics tools.

skills:

	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, Terraform, Ansible, Helm, Docker Compose

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3), Azure (App Services, Blob, SQL)

**Other:**
	Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, MLflow, Airflow, Kubeflow, Data Analytics, BI tools, Security best practices, Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot, ETL
